name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Videochat Extension - IP Locator for Omegle

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IP Locator & more for Omegle-like randomized video chats: Omegle, ome.tv, Chatruletka. Previously known as Chatruletka Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Videochat Extension is a fully independent open-source browser extension that expands the functionality of your favorite online video chats.

We currently support 55 video chat sites on six platforms: Omegle (work-in-progress), Ome.tv, Chatruletka, Minichat, Chatrulez, and Coomeet Free (bot recognition only).

‚òÜ‚òÜ  Key Features ‚òÜ‚òÜ

‚úì IP Locator ‚Äî determines the stranger's approximate location
‚úì World map
‚úì Ban unwanted countries
‚úì Search for specific locations
‚úì Gender Filter
‚úì Dark Mode
‚úì Automation
‚úì Blacklist
‚úì Stats
‚úì Shortcuts/hotkeys
‚úì Streamer Mode
‚úì Simple Mode ‚Äî essential features only
‚úì Customizable ‚Äî configure features as you like
‚úì Open source ‚Äî freedom and transparency
‚úì Indie project ‚Äî community-supported development
‚úì Private and secure ‚Äî we don't collect/sell your data

With this extension installed, you can find out where your interlocutors are from, filter them by gender, search for a specific city, enable dark mode, and much more!


‚òÜ‚òÜ  Indie development ‚òÜ‚òÜ
‚òÖ This is an entirely free, open-source project, but it evolves only because people like you support its indie development on Patreon.
‚òÖ Consider supporting our indie extension: https://www.patreon.com/videochat_extension


‚òÜ‚òÜ  Simple Mode ‚òÜ‚òÜ
‚òÖ a minimalistic mode that includes only essential features:
‚Äî ome.tv, chatruletka, minichat, chatrulez: displaying IP geolocation data in the chat area.
‚Äî omegle: IP Locator & Dark Mode.
‚Äî coomeet free: displaying the stranger's country, bot recognition and volume control.


‚òÜ‚òÜ  Complete list of features ‚òÜ‚òÜ

‚òÖ geolocation (IP Locator)
‚Äî determines the stranger's IP address used for WebRTC connection.
‚Äî uses the IP geolocation service to get the information about that IP address.
‚Äî displays the stranger's approximate location (city/region/country), ISP, and whether they use a cellular network.
‚Äî integration with the 'map' module: IP geolocation data is displayed on the world map.
‚Äî integration with the 'streamer mode' module: IP geolocation data can be displayed in the OBS's text source.
‚Äî determines if a stranger is using a proxy/tor/vpn connection to hide their real IP.
‚Äî option to auto-skip predefined countries/regions/cities.
‚Äî option to search for specific countries/regions/cities.
‚Äî iknowwhatyoudownload integration that allows you to open a list of torrents possibly downloaded by a stranger.
‚Äî option to select the language of ip geolocation data from English, Deutsch (German), Espa√±ol (Spanish), Portugu√™s (Portuguese), Fran√ßais (French), Êó•Êú¨Ë™û (Japanese), ‰∏≠ÂõΩ (Chinese), and –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π (Russian).
‚Äî option to select which ip geolocation services will be used.

‚òÖ map
‚Äî IP geolocation data is displayed on a world map embedded in the UI.
‚Äî displays the approximate area where the stranger you are talking to may be located.
‚Äî displays a marker popup with information about the stranger's approximate location.
‚Äî different options to customize map's behavior.

‚òÖ faceapi (gender recognition)
‚Äî AI-powered client-side gender recognition.
‚Äî option to auto-skip strangers if their gender does not meet your expectations.
‚Äî integration with the 'blacklist' module: option to automatically add strangers that were skipped by facepi to the blacklist.
‚Äî integration with the 'stats' module: counts the statistics of how many men and women you met and how many were auto-skipped.

‚òÖ interface
‚Äî dark mode (dark theme).
‚Äî option to hide your own camera to make conversation more natural.
‚Äî option to hide/show logo, banner, header, and watermark (not on all platforms).
‚Äî option to cancel camera reflection (not on all platforms).
‚Äî option to disable cropping stranger's video (not on all platforms).

‚òÖ automation
‚Äî option to auto-skip strangers that take more than 4 seconds to connect
‚Äî option to auto-skip if you were looking for someone from X country but the video chat found you someone from Y country (not on all platforms)
‚Äî option to automatically close 'make yourself visible' (not on all platforms)

‚òÖ blacklist
‚Äî you can add a stranger's IP address to the blacklist so that the extension can automatically skip them.
‚Äî integration with the 'hotkeys' module: hotkey to add stranger to the blacklist and skip.
‚Äî option to avoid adding cellular IPs to the blacklist.
‚Äî option to play a sound when the extension auto-skips a blacklisted IP.
‚Äî option to clear the blacklist.

‚òÖ stats
‚Äî counts the number of people you've met.
‚Äî counts how much time you've spent in conversations.
‚Äî counts various statistics for other modules such as faceapi / blacklist.

‚òÖ controls
‚Äî improvised control panel that acts as the extension UI.
‚Äî it consists of a header, a content block, and tabs that select what will be displayed in the content block.
‚Äî list of tabs: 'IP', 'Map', 'Bans', 'Stats', 'Settings', 'Info'.
‚Äî the 'Info' tab contains helpful information about the extension: useful links, credits, version history, etc.
‚Äî the header contains the extension name/version, and blocks with buttons for the extension functionality.
‚Äî use the header's buttons to take a screenshot of the cameras / open the camera in picture-in-picture mode.
‚Äî provides control buttons for other modules such as 'streamer mode'.

‚òÖ hotkeys
‚Äî local hotkeys: use the keyboard arrows to skip/skip+blacklist/stop/report.
‚Äî global hotkeys: browser-level shortcuts to skip/skip+blacklist/stop.
‚Äî global hotkeys: browser-level shortcuts to make remote/local screenshots.
‚Äî global hotkeys: browser-level shortcut to switch between the last non-chat tab and the chat tab.
‚Äî provides hotkeys functionality for other modules such as 'streamer mode'.

‚òÖ settings
‚Äî this module is responsible for the functionality of the 'Settings' tab in the UI.
‚Äî all settings are grouped by their module.
‚Äî if you hover over a setting, detailed information about what this setting does will be displayed.

‚òÖ streamer mode
‚Äî a section of specialized features that help streamers broadcast video chats on YouTube and other services.
‚Äî OBS integration - allows you to display IP geolocation data in the text source and control the visibility of the image, which covers the video while you look for a suitable interlocutor.
‚Äî blur & cover - allows you to cover the interlocutor's camera with a blur/picture/gif and look at it through picture-in-picture mode to decide if the interlocutor is suitable to show to your audience.
‚Äî integration with the 'hotkeys' module: local shortcuts to toggle mute/blur/cover
‚Äî integration with the 'controls' module: header buttons to toggle mute/blur/cover


‚òÜ‚òÜ Supported sites ‚òÜ‚òÜ  
* We currently support 55 video chat sites belonging to 6 platforms.
* Please see the full list of supported sites at the link:
* https://github.com/videochat-extension/videochat-extension#supported-chats
